!3 Configure browser to use
#Use CHROMIUM, FIREFOX or WEBKIT as browser
!defineDefault browser     {CHROMIUM}
#!defineDefault browser     {FIREFOX}
#!defineDefault browser     {WEBKIT}

!3 Configure to run headless or not
!defineDefault headless    {false}

#!3 Configure browser characteristics
#!defineDefault width       {375}
#!defineDefault height      {667}
#!defineDefault scaleFactor {1}

!3 Define cookies
# set cookie to prevent cookie consent popup
!|ddt                :map fixture                                                             |
|name                |value  |expires         |domain    |path|sameSite|cookie?               |
|CookiePermissionInfo|go-away|2021-12-31 00:00|.postnl.nl|/   |LAX     |$cookiePermissionInfo=|
|Language            |nl     |2021-12-31 00:00|.postnl.nl|/   |LAX     |$languageCookieNL=    |

!3 Start browser with configured settings
!|script                |playwright setup                |
|set headless           |${headless}                     |
|#                      |set slow mo|1000                |
|#set viewport width     |${width}   |and height|${height}|
|#set device scale factor|${scaleFactor}                  |
|set storage state      |timeanddate                     |
|start browser          |${browser}                      |
|$setup=                |get fixture                     |

!3 Now start playwright and do some basic configuration
Instantiating new playwright fixture with a new browser context en page object.

|script     |playwright fixture   |
|set timeout|10000                |
|set cookie |$cookiePermissionInfo|
|$browser=  |get fixture          |
